item.title: 香港长江和记保证港口交易合法合规
item.description: 香港长江和记周一表示，其受到密切监控的港口交易将严格遵守所有必要的合规标准，绝不会非法执行。【原文：Hong Kong's CK Hutchison said on Monday that its closely monitored ports deal would strictly adhere to all required compliance standards and would never be executed illegally.】

item.title: 远洋运输公司对中美关税缓和表示欢迎
item.description: 德国集装箱航运公司赫伯罗特（Hapag-Lloyd）周一对中美达成暂时削减互惠关税的协议表示欢迎，并称预计中国至美国的预订量将因此增加。【原文：German container shipping firm Hapag-Lloyd on Monday welcomed an agreement between the United States and China to temporarily slash reciprocal tariffs, saying it expected to be buoyed by a resulting increase in bookings from China to the U.S.】

item.title: 共和党的税收和医疗计划有哪些内容？
item.description: 美国国会的共和党人已经公布了一项全面预算方案的初稿，该方案将实现唐纳德-特朗普总统关于减税和减少开支的呼吁，但仍有许多细节问题需要解决。【原文：Republicans in the U.S. Congress have released initial drafts of a sweeping budget package that would fulfill President Donald Trump's calls to cut taxes and reduce spending, though many details still need to be resolved.】

item.title: 美国机构要求特斯拉回答有关机器人出租车部署计划的问题
item.description: 美国汽车安全调查人员要求特斯拉回答有关该汽车制造商计划于 6 月在得克萨斯州奥斯汀推出付费机器人出租车服务的问题，以评估其在恶劣天气下的表现。【原文：U.S. auto safety investigators asked Tesla to answer questions on the automaker's plans to launch a paid robotaxi service in Austin, Texas, in June to assess how it will perform in poor weather.】

item.title: 环球音乐任命马特-埃利斯为新任首席财务官
item.description: 全球最大的音乐厂牌环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group）周一表示，已任命马特-埃利斯（Matt Ellis）为新任首席财务官。【原文：Universal Music Group , the world's biggest music label, said on Monday it has appointed Matt Ellis as its new chief financial officer.】

item.title: 特朗普混乱的贸易战是如何演变的？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普自1月20日上任以来作出的关税决定，从全面征收关税到突然暂停部分关税，震惊了金融市场，并给全球经济带来了一波不确定性。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff decisions since he took office on January 20, from imposing sweeping duties to abruptly pausing some of them, have shocked financial markets and sent a wave of uncertainty through the global economy.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Blackstone 正在洽谈收购公用事业公司 TXNM
item.description: 一位熟悉此事的人士周一表示，资产管理公司 Blackstone 旗下的基础设施投资部门正在洽谈收购新墨西哥州和德克萨斯州的公用事业公司 TXNM Energy。【原文：The infrastructure investing arm of asset manager Blackstone is in talks to buy New Mexico and Texas-focused utility TXNM Energy, a person familiar with the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 通用汽车聘请自动驾驶公司领导担任首席产品官
item.description: 通用汽车公司周一表示，已聘请自动驾驶卡车公司 Aurora 的联合创始人斯特林-安德森（Sterling Anderson）担任其全球产品执行副总裁。【原文：General Motors has hired Sterling Anderson, co-founder of self-driving trucking company Aurora, as its executive vice president of global product, the company said Monday.】

item.title: 科德尔科公司和力拓集团加大智利北部 "矿区 "的开发力度
item.description: 智利铜生产商科德尔科公司（Codelco）和全球矿业巨头力拓公司（Rio Tinto）周一表示，双方已同意开展一项新的合作，旨在加快智利北部阿塔卡马地区 Nuevo Cobre 项目周边矿区的开发。【原文：Chilean copper producer Codelco and global miner Rio Tinto have agreed to a new collaboration aimed at speeding up development of a mining district around their shared Nuevo Cobre project in the Atacama region of northern Chile, Codelco said on Monday.】

item.title: 富达网站故障导致用户无法进行反弹交易
item.description: 富达交易平台在周一上午美国股市开盘交易时发生故障，导致其在线、移动和 Active Trader 应用程序的许多用户无法执行买入或卖出订单。【原文：Fidelity trading platforms experienced outages just as U.S. stock markets opened for trading on Monday morning, leaving many users of its online, mobile and Active Trader apps unable to execute buy or sell orders.】

item.title: 美国众议院在预算提案中大幅削减气候和清洁能源开支
item.description: 美国众议院立法者周日制定了逐步取消关键的清洁能源税收抵免、削减数十亿美元的电动汽车和可再生能源相关开支、加快天然气出口以及收回未使用的气候相关资金的计划，作为共和党人试图通过一项数万亿美元预算以实施唐纳德-特朗普总统议程的一部分。【原文：U.S. House lawmakers laid out plans on Sunday to phase out key clean energy tax credits, as well as slash billions in spending related to electric vehicles and renewable energy, fast-track gas exports and claw back unspent climate-related funds as part of the Republicans' attempt to pass a multi-trillion-dollar budget to carry out President Donald Trump's agenda.】

item.title: 美联储主席库格勒称难以判断美国经济潜在增长
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里安娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）周一表示，鉴于贸易政策的迅速变化以及对今年早些时候急于购买进口商品的家庭和企业造成的影响，美国央行官员很难判断经济的基本实力。【原文：U.S. central bank officials are having trouble judging the underlying strength of the economy given the rapid changes in trade policy and the impact on households and businesses rushing earlier this year to buy imported goods, Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler said on Monday.】

item.title: 特朗普表示可能在本周末与中国国家主席习近平通话
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一表示，他可能在本周末与中国国家主席习近平通话，因为这两个经济竞争对手在贸易协议方面取得了进展。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Monday that he could speak with China's President Xi Jinping at the end of the week amid progress between the two economic rivals on a trade deal.】

item.title: 巴西总统访华，宣布 10 亿美元可持续燃料交易
item.description: 巴西总统访华之际，巴西于周一宣布了两项与中国的合作项目，其中包括由中国 Envision Energy 公司投资 10 亿美元生产可持续航空燃料。【原文：Brazil announced two Chinese partnerships on Monday, including a $1 billion investment by China's Envision Energy to produce sustainable aviation fuel, as the country's president visits China.】

item.title: 中美推迟关税后，市场减少对美联储降息的押注
item.description: 特朗普政府在与中国的贸易战中宣布推迟征收最具惩罚性的关税后，投资者削减了对美联储降息的押注。【原文：Investors trimmed bets on Federal Reserve rate cuts following the announcement of a delay of the most punitive tariffs imposed in the Trump administration's trade battle with China, with an initial rate reduction now not seen until September and only a half-point reduction seen by year's end.】

item.title: 各国在联合国举行 "杀手级机器人 "会谈，因为监管滞后
item.description: 周一，各国将在联合国举行会议，重启对现代战争中越来越多地使用的人工智能控制的自主武器进行监管的努力，因为专家们警告说，为新的致命技术设置警戒线的时间已经不多了。【原文：Countries are meeting at the United Nations on Monday to revive efforts to regulate the kinds of AI-controlled autonomous weapons increasingly used in modern warfare, as experts warn time is running out to put guardrails on new lethal technology.】

item.title: 巴西财政部长：美国应更宽容地看待拉丁美洲
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周一表示，美国应该更加慷慨地看待拉丁美洲和南美洲，并认为世界最大的经济体可以从整个拉丁美洲和南美洲更大的工业发展中 "获益良多"。【原文：The United States should look more generously at Latin America and South America, Brazil Finance Minister Fernando Haddad said on Monday, arguing that the world's largest economy has "much to gain" from greater industrial development across the continent.】

item.title: 罗氏将投资 7 亿美元在北卡罗来纳州新建药品生产设施
item.description: 罗氏集团周一表示，计划投资 7 亿多美元在北卡罗来纳州霍利斯普林斯市新建一座药品生产厂。【原文：Roche Group said on Monday that it plans to invest more than $700 million in a new drug manufacturing facility in Holly Springs, North Carolina.】

item.title: 人工智能工具撼动教育科技行业，Chegg 将裁员 22
item.description: Chegg 周一表示，随着学生越来越多地转向 ChatGPT 等人工智能驱动的工具，而不是传统的教育技术平台，该公司将裁员约 22%，即 248 人，以削减成本并精简运营。【原文：Chegg said on Monday it would lay off about 22% of its workforce, or 248 employees, to cut costs and streamline its operations as students increasingly turn to AI-powered tools such as ChatGPT over traditional edtech platforms.】

item.title: 埃里克-特朗普支持的美国比特币公司将通过全股合并上市
item.description: 由美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的两个长子支持的新比特币矿商美国比特币公司（American Bitcoin）周一表示，将通过与麒麟数字矿业公司（Gryphon Digital Mining）的全股票合并在纳斯达克上市。【原文：American Bitcoin, a new bitcoin miner backed by U.S. President Donald Trump's two eldest sons, said on Monday it will list on the Nasdaq via an all-stock merger with Gryphon Digital Mining .】

item.title: 中国官方媒体欢迎美国关税协议，其他媒体则持怀疑态度
item.description: 中美两国周一达成的关税协议在中国社交媒体上受到怀疑，而官方评论则对这一消息表示欢迎。【原文：A tariff deal between the United States and China on Monday was greeted with scepticism on Chinese social media, while official commentary welcomed the news.】

item.title: 保险经纪公司 Hub International 获 16 亿美元投资，估值达 290 亿美元
item.description: 保险经纪公司 Hub International 周一表示，该公司在一项约 16 亿美元的少数股权投资交易中获得了 290 亿美元的估值。【原文：Insurance broker Hub International said on Monday it has secured a $29 billion valuation in a minority investment transaction of about $1.6 billion.】

item.title: 投资者欢呼中美关税休战，但对最终协议持谨慎态度
item.description: 中美贸易谈判取得突破性进展，推动全球股市和美元走高，但投资者担心进一步的谈判可能会是一个漫长的过程，从而抑制了乐观情绪，因为全球经济放缓的风险依然存在。【原文：A breakthrough in U.S.-China trade talks has propelled world stocks and the dollar higher, but investors fear further negotiations could prove a long slog, tempering optimism, as risks of a global economic slowdown persist.】

item.title: 消息人士称，贸易休战后美国客户应更容易获得中国稀土许可证
item.description: 据中国业内的两位消息人士称，周一贸易战休战后，美国客户的稀土出口许可证可能更容易获得中国政府的批准，但不可能完全取消限制。【原文：Rare earth export permits for U.S. customers are likely to have an easier time getting approval from Beijing after Monday's trade war truce, however a complete removal of the restrictions is unlikely, according to two sources in the industry in China.】

item.title: 福克斯公司季度收入超出预期，超级碗带动广告业务增长
item.description: 福克斯公司周一公布的第三季度营收超出华尔街预期，这主要得益于超级碗带动的广告业务增长、Tubi 流媒体服务的强劲表现以及更高的新闻收视率和定价。【原文：Fox Corp beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue on Monday, thanks to advertising growth driven by the Super Bowl, strength in its Tubi streaming service and stronger news ratings and pricing.】

item.title: 百威啤酒制造商百威英博将向美国设施投资 3 亿美元
item.description: 安海斯-布希英博公司（Anheuser-Busch InBev）周一表示，在唐纳德-特朗普总统推动本地生产的背景下，该公司今年将向其在美国的制造业务投资 3 亿美元。【原文：Anheuser-Busch InBev said on Monday it would invest $300 million in its manufacturing operations in the United States this year amid a push for local production under President Donald Trump.】

item.title: Stellantis 预计 11 月开始生产混合动力菲亚特 500
item.description: 汽车制造商 Stellantis 周一表示，其目标是在 11 月开始生产混合动力版菲亚特 500 城市汽车。【原文：Automaker Stellantis aims to start producing the hybrid version of its Fiat 500 city car in November, it said on Monday.】

item.title: 垂直宇航公司计划推出远程混合空中出租车变体，以扩大市场覆盖范围
item.description: 垂直宇航公司（Vertical Aerospace）周一表示，该公司正在开发其空中出租车 VX4 的远程混合动力电动变体，旨在拓展包括国防和物流在内的商业市场。【原文：Vertical Aerospace said on Monday it is developing a long-range hybrid-electric variant of its air-taxi VX4, aiming to expand into commercial markets including defense and logistics.】

item.title: GTA VI》延期后，电子游戏发行商急于抢占秋季上市窗口
item.description: 在 Take-Two Interactive 公司将《侠盗猎车手 6》的上市时间推迟到明年 5 月的几天后，竞争对手的发行商们正在利用这个机会锁定其游戏的上市日期，以避免与业界最令人期待的游戏之一直接冲突。【原文：Days after Take-Two Interactive delayed the launch of "Grand Theft Auto VI" to May next year, rival publishers are using that opportunity to lock in release dates for their games to avoid a direct clash with one of the industry's most anticipated titles.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯在 PIF 框架下成立人工智能开发公司
item.description: 据沙特阿拉伯国家通讯社周一报道，沙特阿拉伯王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼（Mohammed bin Salman）在公共投资基金（PIF）下成立了一家新公司，负责开发和管理人工智能技术。【原文：Saudi Arabia's Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman launched a new company under the Public Investment Fund (PIF) to develop and manage artificial intelligence technologies, the state news agency reported on Monday.】
